Damage: 4D '''Capsule''': One of the standard scout ships in the Imperial Scout Corps is the Lone Scout by Sienar. The Lone Scout uses many of the basic technologies in Sienar's popular TIE line of starfighter, but adds substantial room for passengers and cargo. The LAS-2 is an advance on the original Lone Scout and features an improved hyperdrive backup and new deep scan sensor array. The popularity of the Lone Scout has brought it into service in the New Republic Scout Service. The New Republic uses the Lone Scout for many of the standard exploration missions into the Wild Space. In the Scout Service the Lone Scout will usually have a pilot and a specialist, but the extra passenger space permits this vessel to perform a wide variety of missions. '''Source''': Galaxy Guide 8: Scouts (page )
